hero.title: Modern AI Powered Reference
hero.description: Powerful, intuitive reference management for researchers, students, and academics. Simplicity and efficiency, redefined.
hero.availableForPlatforms: Available for Windows, macOS, and Linux

fastAndEasy.title: Fast & Easy
fastAndEasy.description: Organize your references in minutes with intuitive design and smart features. Focus on your research instead of complex processes.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your data is protected with end-to-end encryption. Whether stored locally or in the cloud, your privacy is always our priority.

accessible.title: Access Anywhere
accessible.description: Desktop, web, or mobile - syncs across all your devices. Stay productive even in offline environments with offline access.

features.title: AI-Powered Reference Management
features.description: Citext is an intelligent, AI-assisted literature management and analysis tool designed for academics and graduate students. It helps researchers organize sources efficiently, generate citations, and analyze literature with cutting-edge automation.

smartOrganization.title: Annotation & Smart Organization
smartOrganization.description: Highlight and annotate any section within your imported PDF documents using the Annotation module. Organize your resources efficiently with AI-driven tagging and categorization.

powerfulSearch.title: CrossCheck & Smart Search
powerfulSearch.description: Use CrossCheck to detect cross-references between texts and Search&Cite to find related or similar studies instantly. Explore literature faster and with higher accuracy.

teamCollaboration.title: AI Integration & Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: With the Airisto module, you can perform instant AI-based text analysis and verification, enabling efficient collaboration and intelligent feedback within your research team.

quickCitation.title: AutoCite & Translation
quickCitation.description: Generate direct (quote) or indirect (paraphrase) citations effortlessly using AutoCite. Instantly translate selected material or entire sections into your desired language with the Translate module.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Citext?
whyChoose.description: Built by researchers, for researchers. Citext addresses the real challenges faced by the academic community with innovative solutions.

noVendorLockIn.title: No Vendor Lock-in
noVendorLockIn.description: Your data belongs to you. Export your library at any time in multiple formats including BibTeX, RIS, and EndNote. Switch between tools without losing your work.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast Performance
lightningFast.description: Optimized for speed with local-first architecture. Search through thousands of references instantly, even when offline. Built with modern web technologies.

academicFirst.title: Academic-First Design
academicFirst.description: Every feature is designed with academic workflows in mind. From dissertation writing to systematic reviews, Citext adapts to your research methodology.

trustedInstitutions.title: Trusted by Leading Institutions
trustedInstitutions.quote: Citext has transformed how our research department manages citations. The collaboration features are exactly what we needed.
trustedInstitutions.author: Dr. Sarah Williams, Research Director

download.title: Available on all platforms
download.description: Download Citext for your preferred operating system and start managing your references today.
download.requirements: System requirements: Windows 10+, macOS 10.14+, or Ubuntu 18.04+

howToUse.title: How to Use Citext
howToUse.description: Learn how Citext helps you collect, organize, cite, and annotate your research effortlessly — powered by intelligent automation.

collect.title: Collect with a Click
collect.description: Citext automatically detects academic content while you browse and helps you capture it instantly. Whether it’s a journal article, conference paper, dataset, or preprint — Citext saves it with one click and keeps your references organized seamlessly.

organize.title: Organize Your Way
organize.description: Once captured, your references are automatically categorized and neatly organized. Citext uses intelligent structure to help you find, tag, and group your sources effortlessly — so you can focus on your research, not your folders.

cite.title: Cite in Word
cite.description: With Citext, you can insert your collected references directly into your Word documents using the integrated toolbar. Simply click Add Citation, and Citext automatically formats and inserts the reference in your preferred citation style.

annotation.title: Annotation & Smart Organization
annotation.description: Highlight and annotate any section within your imported PDF documents using the Annotation module. Organize your resources efficiently with AI-driven tagging and categorization.

support.title: Support
support.description: The Citext support team is here to help you as quickly as possible. Visit our support page for more information.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Join thousands of researchers who trust Citext to manage their references.
